result.execSummary:
The defendant Miguel A Martinez-Sanchez was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Battery, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 940.19(1).
  • Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).
  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).
  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: Alcohol assessment and follow through with recommendations. No alcohol, random UA's at discretion of agent.
Drug assessment and follow through with recommendations. No controlled substances, random UA's at discretion of agent.

Counseling, treatment, services as deemed appropriate by agent including anger management. Contact with the victim as allowed by the agent. Deft is ordered to provide a DNA specimen prior being released from jail. Defendant must obey all rules and regulations of probation.

records.addlTxt: Per RASO - mandatory jail time has been served
Per RCSO, DNA collected - 06-07-2015 at 12:15 am

Defendant Miguel A Martinez-Sanchez in court with attorney Cynthia Herber for John Alexander Cabranes.  Defendant Miguel A Martinez-Sanchez in custody.  Christopher D. Steenrod appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter:  Katie Giebel.  Interpreter:  Brenda Bartholomew.  Req for bond mod.   (1000C w no violent cont).
BTC:  Bond mod denied
Status conference on August 5, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Bail/bond hearing on June 30, 2015 at 02:30 pm.
Status conference on August 3, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Pre-trial conference on July 9, 2015 at 03:15 pm.

Charges per attached criminal complaint. Conditions:  No contact with the victim SL (person, property, residence or family).   Failure to appear will result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, possible bail jumping charges and forfeiture of any bond on deposit.

Defendant Miguel A Martinez-Sanchez in court with attorney Mindy M. Nolan.  Defendant Miguel A Martinez-Sanchez in custody.  Noah Michael Wishau appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Interpreter, Daniel Lopez, appeared on behalf of the defendant.   Court Reporter Mark Garvin.   Reading of complaint is waived, probable cause found, p-ng, bond set.
  Pre-trial conference scheduled for July 9, 2015 at 03:15 pm.  Status conference scheduled for August 3, 2015 at 08:30 am.
